snippet: A federal judge refused to require the Justice Department to disclose a memorandum providing the legal justification for the killing of a United States citizen in Yemen in 2011.
abstract: Federal Judge Colleen McMahon refuses to require Justice Department to disclose memorandum providing legal justification for killing of United States citizen and terrorist leader Anwar al-Awlaki in Yemen in 2011.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge refused to require the Justice Department to disclose a memorandum providing the legal justification for the killing of a United States citizen in Yemen in 2011.

headline.seo: Judge Rules Memo on Targeted Killing Can Remain Secret
headline.main: Secrecy of Memo on Drone Killing Is Upheld
headline.print_headline: Secrecy of Memo on Drone Killing Is Upheld
